top_categories.workout_context: Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne’s belgian ardennes, european gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne. Make this intensity feel like home.
Racing Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The varied gradients at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne’s belgian ardennes gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne’s belgian ardennes gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Muscular force work builds the torque for headwinds and belgian ardennes gravel at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne — when you can’t spin, you grind.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on belgian ardennes gravel.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on belgian ardennes gravel to build confidence. Expect: belgian ardennes, european gravel, belgium.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 50 miles of belgian ardennes gravel in Andenne, Belgium.
